extendedInfo.description: More than 10 million users! One of best tools on Android market. Support 18 languages. Cupcake (Android 1.5) and Donut (Android 1.6) only, Android 2.0, 2.1, 2.2, 2.3, 3.0, 3.1, 3.2 please use ES File Explorer standard version.ES File Explorer for Android is a free, featured all-in-one file manager & application manager & task killer & dropbox client & ftp client which explores your phone and your computer. It allows android users anywhere in the world to manage their resources for free, it makes easy to manage, stay connected using your 3G, EDGE or WiFi, and share with friends, upload photos, watch videos.Latest Features List :* File Manager -- Operate files(Copy, Paste, Cut/Move, Create, Delete and Rename, Share/Send) in the phone and computers* Multiselect files* Application manager -- Manage apps(Install, Uninstall, Backup, Shortcuts, Category)* Compress and Decompress ZIP files, Unpack RAR files, can create encrypted (AES 256 bit) ZIP files* View Different file formats, photos, docs, videos anywhere, support third party applications such as Document To Go to open document files* Thumbnails for APK,images, and with an inbuilt image browser* Text viewers and editors* Search files* Access your Home PC, via WIFI with SMB* FTP, it's your FTP client, manage the files on the FTP server as the ones on the sd card* Dropbox, it's an enhanced dropbox client other than the official version. It can save photos and videos to your dropbox and share your photos and docs, easily edit docs in your Dropbox.* Bluetooth file transfer tool. You can copy and paste files between bluetooth ready devices.It supports OBEX FTP for browsing devices and transfering files between Bluetooth devices.* Kill tasks, with a one click, pretty simple widget for auto kill, with ignore list to ignore some applications you don't want to kill. It is an advanced task killer to kill running applications and clean memory(This feature needs ES Task Manager module installed)* Shortcuts, bookmark manager (This feature needs ES Bookmark Manager module installed)* Root explorer feature. It is the ultimate file management tools for root users. You might access the whole file system and data directories, and change permissions.* Developers can visit our website for the developer interface for picking files from your applications, email attachments, etc.* And much more. We're working for a best file manager for users of ES, so, do not hesitate to CONTACT ES with your advice, or if you have any issue.

reviews.title: simple yet efficient
reviews.comment: practical, intuitive and helps only when neccessary!    Improve: some popup shuld leave more space for smaller screens - eg Search leaves very little space for the settings in the middle [xperia mini]
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I DESPISE THE NEW UPDATE!!!
reviews.comment: It removed useful functions and added redundant ones. Whatever you do, don\'t download this app. There are PLENTY of better file mangers out there than this one!!
reviews.author: I Luv CuteShoes

reviews.title: Excellent for selecting files
reviews.comment: I use the new version (3) for all other purposes but for file selecting from other apps, this is what you need. You can search for files in the file selector unlike any other file manager that I know of. Excellent for finding icons for the likes of Widgetsoid and Wave Launcher
reviews.author: Jonas Kamp

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: Simple, easy to use. I gift 5star bcoz Can work all. Exellent file manager.

reviews.title: don\'t know what happen
reviews.comment: I have an es file explorer before then I factory data reset my phone so I lost it. Then I decided to download a new one and I found this. This is not the app that I used before. It\'s very different, didnt like the upgrade, for me the first version is much better. please fix it.

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Here I am able to take the apps backup No need to download from app store every time when the phone farmatted

reviews.comment: Works great. I love the UI. Very easy to use and very intuitive.

reviews.title: Mark C
reviews.comment: Great app! Welcome replacement for my very average included manager, which I was only happy to uninstall.

reviews.title: Very very useful & user friendly
reviews.comment: I copied the different folders inside memory card, but when I saw in gallery it was showing all videos scattered. I was shocked. Then I found this software and it works like as shown in above pics.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A good one
reviews.comment: Well been using this app in my HTC desire c which has no inbuilt file manager like Samsung has. And this is a very great help to install any app or move the app.but need lot more extra features and changes
reviews.author: VIKAS ROX

reviews.title: Overall functions run flawless but
reviews.comment: when it comes to deleting very large files,such as gameloft sd data,assume 600 up MB,this app take very long time..even minutes..sometimes hangs n reboot my device,but when root explorer do the same task,it do the job in 5sec..there\'s space for improvements..Xperia Play 4.0.3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great ui
reviews.comment: I find this to be one of the more intuitive apps of this type

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Would be 5 stars but you got rid of the \'move to\' option in the operations list. I used that everyday to move files for school.

reviews.comment: It does not work on my htc explorer, when i try to open the app it fails giving me the options of force close and report. Report option crashes when selected.

reviews.title: Great program
reviews.comment: A must have for me. Cant do without it on my phone. Don\'t get bothered by ads etc as in other programs.

reviews.title: A lot better than the standard version
reviews.comment: Still wanting the ability to use my own images as the background, but at least this version isn\'t stupidly cluttered. Works almost flawlessly under jelly bean!

reviews.title: Powerful application
reviews.comment: This is simple and powerful application. A user friendly app.:-)
